panels.title: hookrun下的metric任务执行成功总次数
hookrun下的metric任务执行失败总次数
hookrun下的metric任务执行成功耗时(s)分布
hookrun下的metric任务执行失败耗时(s)分布

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(bkbcs_hook_metric_exec_duration_seconds_sum{phase="Successful"}) by(namespace, owner, metric)/sum(bkbcs_hook_metric_exec_duration_seconds_count{phase="Successful"}) by(namespace, owner, metric))

panels.title: hookrun下的metric任务执行成功耗时top10的metric

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(bkbcs_hook_metric_exec_duration_seconds_sum{phase=~"Error|Failed"}) by(namespace, owner, metric)/sum(bkbcs_hook_metric_exec_duration_seconds_count{phase=~"Error|Failed"}) by(namespace, owner, metric))
